original_title: President to make special statement tomorrow
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe will make a special statement tomorrow regarding the measures taken by the government during the last nine months and the future steps in the social, economic and political reforms programme of Sri Lanka.
According to the President's Media Division (PMD), the special statement will be telecast at 8 p.m. tomorrow on all television, radio, and all other news media to inform the public.
During the speech, the people will gain an understanding of Sri Lanka's National Transformation Roadmap.
